author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-WANdisco Says ‍Bookings Secured In 2017 Up 45 Pct To $22.5 Mln
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - WANdisco Plc:
* ‍BOOKINGS SECURED IN 2017, UP 45% YEAR-ON-YEAR TO $22.5 MILLION​
* ‍BOOKINGS IN H2 2017 UP 28% YEAR-ON-YEAR TO $12.3 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
